rows.label: qst710701_msg0001
rows.name:
Vases, mo... Anyone want a vase,
mo? Please buy a vase, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0003
rows.name: No one's buying, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0004
rows.name:
Mo... This is a problem, mo... This
vase isn't selling at all, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0005
rows.name:
Mo? Will you listen to
Momimi's troubles, mo?

rows.label: qst710701_msg0006
rows.name:
I may not look it, but Momimi
is a merchant of the Pyrithium
Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0007
rows.name:
I came to the capital to do
business, and I got a request
to lend someone 1 million G, mo.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0008
rows.name:
I gladly accepted, but
when I counted my money,
I only had 900,000 G, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0009
rows.name:
Even after becoming a merchant,
Momimi is still a klutz, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0010
rows.name:
In that case, I'll raise the
missing 100,000 G like a true
merchant, on the spot, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0011
rows.name:
...So I thought, and I've been
trying to sell this vase I
brought from the guild, mo.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0012
rows.name:
But the people of Iira won't
buy this vase at all, mo.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0013
rows.name:
Even though it's a vase that increases
your energy and luck a million times from
the day you buy it, it's strange, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0014
rows.name:
Mo? Such a suspicious vase
is too scary for anyone to
buy, mo? Really, mo?

rows.label: qst710701_msg0015
rows.name:
Anyway, I have to get another
100,000 G somehow, or Momimi
will be eaten, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0016
rows.name: That's it, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0017
rows.name:
If you have any items that look
like they'd sell for a high price,
please give them to Momimi, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0018
rows.name:
With those as merchandise, the skilled
merchant Momimi will sell them at a high
price through my own channels, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0019
rows.name:
Mo mo... But selling them
one by one to get money will
take too much time, mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0020
rows.name: That's it, mo! I'll use this, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0021
rows.name: Ta-da! "Momimi's Points," mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0022
rows.name: Mo? Isn't this toy money, mo?

rows.label: qst710701_msg0023
rows.name:
No, mo! It's "Momimi's Points,"
mo! "MnP" for short, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0024
rows.name:
For the goods you bring
me, I'll value them at 1
MnP for every 200G, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0025
rows.name:
When that reaches 100,000G...
that is, 500 MnP, Momimi will
sell them all at once, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0026
rows.name:
It's okay, mo! Momimi's valuation
is famous in the guild for not
being off by a single G, mo!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0027
rows.name:
...So, I'm leaving the
procurement of goods to you, mo!
